      • retrieveSegment

        DataVersionInfo retrieveSegment(com.igeekinc.indelible.oid.ObjectID segmentID,
                              IndelibleVersion version,
                              RetrieveVersionFlags flags)
                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                       java.io.IOException
        Retrieves the specified version of the segment identified by this ObjectID
        Parameters:
        segmentID -
        version - - the version to retrieve. Set to null for latest version
        flags - - Retrieves exactly the version if set to kExact. If set to kNearest will return the first version <= specified version
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • storeSegment

        CASStoreInfo storeSegment(NetworkDataDescriptor segmentDescriptor)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 java.rmi.RemoteException
        Stores a segment and returns the CASSegmentID assigned to it. The caller can specify whether the segment is to be marked as mutable or not. If the mutable flag is true, the CASSegmentID returned will always be a new ID. If the mutable flag is false, the CASSegmentID returned may be the CASSegmentID returned to previous call to store a segment with the same CASIdentifier.
        Parameters:
        segmentDescriptor -
        mutable -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        NoSpaceException
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • storeVersionedSegment

        void storeVersionedSegment(com.igeekinc.indelible.oid.ObjectID id,
                         NetworkDataDescriptor segmentDescriptor)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                  SegmentExists
        Stores a segment with a given ObjectID. Using this call implies that the data is mutable. If the ObjectID has already been stored, an IOException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        id -
        segmentDescriptor -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        SegmentExists
        NoSpaceException
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • storeReplicatedSegment

        void storeReplicatedSegment(com.igeekinc.indelible.oid.ObjectID replicateSegmentID,
                          IndelibleVersion version,
                          NetworkDataDescriptor networkDescriptor,
                          CASCollectionEvent curCASEvent)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.rmi.RemoteException
        Replicates a segment from another server. Should only be called by the ReplicationManager. Needs to be removed from the public API
        Parameters:
        replicateSegmentID -
        networkDescriptor -
        curCASEvent -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • releaseSegment

        boolean releaseSegment(com.igeekinc.indelible.oid.ObjectID releaseID)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.rmi.RemoteException
        Release the segment referred to by the ID. If all segments referring to a particular CASIdentifier are released, the data may be deleted.
        Parameters:
        releaseID -
        Returns:
        true if the releaseID was in the collection, false if the releaseID was not found
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.rmi.RemoteException
